columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Received Document record ID.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: EPSD_START_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Start instant for the received episode.

columns.name: EPSD_END_INST_DTTM
columns.description: End instant for the received episode.

columns.name: EPSD_IDENT
columns.description: Unique identifier for the received episode.

columns.name: EPSD_SET_ID
columns.description: Episode set ID that represents a common identifier across all document revisions.

columns.name: EPSD_TYP_ID_C_NAME
columns.description:
The episode type category ID for the received episode.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.description: The free text comment for this row's received episode.

columns.description: Universally unique identifier (UUID) of the received episode DXR document.
